verbose_text: The expression of myelin associated glycoprotein (MAG), a marker for myelin-axon integrity XREF_BIBR, as well as the expression of myelin basic protein (MBP) and the axonal marker neurofilament (NF) XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, respectively, were quantified at three days, ten days, one month, and three months post-injury in the BCAS group using immunochemistry and western blots; all results were compared to those obtained from the sham operated group.
